breakfasts.name: Eggs and Sausage
wes_says: Hello! I am Chef Wes!
This is my kitchen where I'd like to cook some breakfast with you.
I will let you pick some ingredients for our breakfast meals.
You will need to pick the correct items for the breakfast.
If you pick the wrong ingredients, you will have to start over.
If you pick the right ingredients, you will get to move on to the next level.
Let's get started!
First, we will need to get the ingredients ready.
We will be making Eggs and Sausage.
Pick the right ingredients below for Eggs and Sausage.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Eggs and Sausage!

breakfasts.name: Bagel and Cream Cheese
wes_says: Great job! On the first level!
Let's move on to the next level.
We will be making Bagel and Cream Cheese.
Pick the right ingredients below for Bagel and Cream Cheese.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Bagel and Cream Cheese!

breakfasts.name: Quiche
wes_says: Right on!
Next Level is coming up!
This time, we will be making something a little more difficult.
We will be making Quiche.
Pick the right ingredients below for Quiche.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Quiche!

breakfasts.name: Quiche
wes_says: Way to go, on the third level!
Let's move on to the next level.
Seems like you are getting the hang of this!
We will be making Quiche again but...
Also pick the right ingredients below for the pie crust.
Pick the right ingredients below for Quiche.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Quiche!

breakfasts.name: Bacon Pancakes
wes_says: Wohoo! On the fourth level!
Here we go to the next level.
We will be making Bacon Pancakes.
Pick the right ingredients below for Bacon Pancakes.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Bacon Pancakes!

breakfasts.name: Breakfast Burrito
wes_says: Awesome! On the fifth level!
Let's move on to the next level.
We will be making Breakfast Burrito.
Pick the right ingredients below for Breakfast Burrito.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Breakfast Burrito!

breakfasts.name: Chocolate Chip Waffles
wes_says: You are doing great!
Away we go to the next level.
We will be making Chocolate Chip Waffles.
Pick the right ingredients below for Chocolate Chip Waffles.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Chocolate Chip Waffles!

breakfasts.name: Full English Breakfast
wes_says: Keep it up!
Let's move on to the next level.
We will be picking more ingredients for some foreign breakfast.
We will be making Full English Breakfast.
Pick the right ingredients below for Full English Breakfast.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Full English Breakfast!

breakfasts.name: Chinese Congee
wes_says: You are almost there!
Lets head to that next level
We will be making Chinese Congee.
Pick the right ingredients below for Chinese Congee.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Chinese Congee!

breakfasts.name: Japanese Breakfast
wes_says: You did it!
Let's move on to the last level.
We will be making Japanese Breakfast.
Pick the right ingredients below for Japanese Breakfast.
breakfasts.result_message: Great job! You have made Japanese Breakfast!

breakfasts.name: Game Over
wes_says: You have completed all the levels!
Great job!
You are now a breakfast expert!
Thank you for playing!
See you next time!
Also keep the kitchen clean!
